com.eclipsesource.v8

Class V8ScriptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.eclipsesource.v8.V8RuntimeException
            • com.eclipsesource.v8.V8ScriptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    V8ScriptCompilationException, V8ScriptExecutionException

    public abstract class V8ScriptException
extends V8RuntimeException
    An exception that indicates that the execution of a script failed. Details about the exception, such as the line number, stack trace, and message can retrieved using the accessors.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
